title.rendered: CMMC Client Case Study: Compliance Preparation Process

content.rendered:
CMMC Client Case Study: Compliance Preparation Process – Key to 2023 Business Strategy

Join us to see firsthand how Nate Ankrom, President of Genuine Machine Products, is following a structured compliance preparation process to achieve certification goals. Gain the insights you need to create your roadmap to maintaining compliance for existing & future contracts.

You’ll learn:

• How the client identified current compliance gaps & received cost-effective recommendations on high-priority tasks


• How a 360-degree approach to CMMC compliance became a part of the client’s overall business strategy that worked within budget parameters


• How the client ensures the appropriate policy documentation & plan of action & milestones are in place for the auditor & for future evaluations


• Why DoD subcontractors should align their organization with cybersecurity experts to accelerate time to certification

Avoid costly disruptions to your business & achieve your CMMC preparation goals in 2023.

excerpt.rendered: Join us to see firsthand how Nate Ankrom, President of Genuine Machine Products, is following a structured compliance preparation process to achieve certification goals. Gain the insights you need to create your roadmap to maintaining compliance for existing & future contracts.
